purpose: Facilitates the development and coordination of AI agents for complex tasks
principle: Built on a modular architecture leveraging Python for agent development and Bedrock for orchestration
reusability: Offers a flexible framework for creating and integrating multiple AI agents, supports plug-and-play components
limitations: Early-stage development with potential stability issues and limited documentation
name: ai-agents
highlight: A framework for building and orchestrating multi-agent systems using Bedrock
